title: Game Freezes in Loading Screen
body:
Hi there!

Since the 6.13 patch (though I'm not entirely certain it is because of the patch), any game I've tried to load into has frozen on the loading screen. It happens almost as soon as I enter the loading screen, and I stay stuck at about ~30%. I've tried the file checker before launching the League client, and it did not detect anything.

When in the loading screen, I cannot:
*  Alt-Tab out  
* Ctrl-Alt-Delete
* Ctrl-Shift-Esc

To clarify, all of my background tasks continue running, I just cannot leave the loading screen, and I cannot load into the game. 

Originally, my laptop was having connectivity issues and then broke, leaving me with Low Priority Queue for a few games.

So I bought a new laptop. That's when the loading screen started freezing, and it was also when 6.13 was released. I have since then returned that laptop and got a different, brand-new one, which is also having the same problem now. I'd love to get back to playing the game, so i would greatly appreciate any help that can be given me. 

Thank you all! :^)

replies.body:
Since you've consistently seen issues across multiple devices, it's very likely the core cause is a poor connection to the servers. For this reason, I recommend you take a look at our [Connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to resolve this with the most common fixes. 

Let me know if you run into any troubles with those steps, or have any questions.
